skillTree.localised_description: This proud and noble Unicorn elevates the Enchantress above her host, so all may see and be strengthened by her blessed presence.

effects.description: Mount: Silvaron

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: No one is more accomplished in the Lore of Life than the Fay Enchantress.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Life spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Dwellers Below Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Regrowth Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Whether a former Wizard who displeased the Enchantress or merely a toad, this magic-imbued amphibian strengthens her spells whilst weakening those of her opponents.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: "By this blessed water, prepare us for your service, dear Lady."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +30% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "What is the secret of the Grail? Whom does it serve?"

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 20% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Led by noble example, peasants fight longer and harder lest their Lord be dishonoured.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Like the lion, this one is the biggest and the bravest of his kind... with the sharpest teeth.

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Rally!" and "Stand Your Ground"

skillTree.localised_description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: By which the person of the Fay Enchantress may remain unmolested in the face of sustained attack.

effects.description: Ward save: 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: The Fay is the spiritual representation of the Lady, her blessing upon a shrine can bring the goddess close.

effects.description: Construction cost: -25% for Worship buildings

skillTree.localised_description: Those touched by the Grail are utterly devoted and would lay down their life for the Fay Enchantress.

skillTree.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

effects.description: Spell: "Awakening of the Wood"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Life Bloom"

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

effects.description: Spell: "Awakening of the Wood"
Spell: "Earth Blood"

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

backgroundSkills.localised_description:
"When the clarion call is sounded
	 I will ride out and fight in the name of Liege and Lady
	Whilst I draw breath the lands bequeathed
	 unto me will remain untainted by evil
	 Honour is all, Chivalry is all..."

"I set down my lance, symbol of duty
	I spurn those whom I love
	I relinquish all and take up the tools of my quest
	No obstacle will stand before me
	No plea for help shall find me waiting
	No moon will look upon me twice lest I be judged idle
	I give my body, heart and soul to the Lady whom I seek..."

"That which is sacrosanct I shall preserve
	 That which is sublime I will protect
	That which threatens I will destroy
	For my holy wrath will know no bounds..."
